+
+ What I'll Focus On:
+Responsive layout: Perfect on both PC and mobile.
+
+Modern UI: Clean padding, spacing, shadows, rounded corners, etc.
+
+Proper button and input placement.
+
+No changes to business logic / functionality.
+
+Tailwind-first since youâ€™re using tailwind.config.ts.
+
+ðŸ“‚ Key Files to Style (based on your tree):
+We'll review and update the visible UI components. Here's the ideal order to send files:
+
+Step 1: Main Chat UI
+Send:
+
+components/chat/ChatBox.tsx

+components/chat/Message.tsx

+Step 3: Video Components

+
+Step 5: Global CSS and Layout

+
+src/app/layout.tsx
